message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more!
That's a bit too skewed towards you, Bob!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm getting greedy, you're getting less!
That's not a fair deal, Bob! I deserve more than 15%!
I'm trying to be reasonable, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Not a chance, Bob! I'm not going to get taken advantage of like that!
I'm getting serious, Bob. This is my best offer so far!
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
No way, Bob! You're not getting away with this!
This is my last serious offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're out of time, I'm taking it all!
No way, Bob! I'd rather walk away with nothing than let you have it all!
This is my final offer, Bob. Don't make me regret it!
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking almost everything!
No, Bob! I'd rather have nothing than give you almost everything!
